basic.floral_language:
Phalaenopsis
Floriography: elegant, quiet, wise
Phalaenopsis amabilis has beautiful flowers like butterflies in serene tropical rainforests, one of the three national flowers in Indonesia.
Phalaenopsis amabilis has a graceful looking with various flower colors, white aerial roots surround leaves and butterfly-like flowers.
Phalaenopsis amabilis blooms normally in January-February for more than 1-2 months. With modern regulation techniques, Phalaenopsis amabilis can flower year around.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-July, viewing period up to 1-2 months

maintenance.soil: In sphagnum moss, replace once a year
maintenance.sunlight: Before flowering put under gentle sunlight, avoid direct strong light, when flowering put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly every 5-7 days, may water by put the soil in water, may spray water in the air in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly, except flowering stages
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers and diseased leaves; remove peduncle after flowering, except the 2-3 segments at the bottom of peduncle, about 10cm
